Want to talk about Rivals? Join our Discord.

Soundtrack and the music that influenced Rivals.

Description

Rivals is a unique kind of detective game.

It follows the lives and careers of two musicians, Josh Moore and Luke Jackson over 15 years, as they progress in the alt-country scene. 

The game combines written, audio, visual and meta-game puzzles to create an enthralling and moving experience. It plays for roughly 2-3 hours, including an extensive post main-game experience.

The game also has an original soundtrack, performed by noted Americana singers Robert Chaney and Riley Catherall.
